lihalite commented on pull request #4998: ARROW-5876: [C++][Python] add basic auth flight proto message to C++ and Python 
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4998#discussion_r310125862
 
 

 ##########
 File path: python/pyarrow/_flight.pyx
 ##########
 @@ -211,6 +211,47 @@ cdef class Result:
         return pyarrow_wrap_buffer(self.result.get().body)
 
 
+cdef class BasicAuth:
+    """A container for basic auth."""
+    cdef:
+        unique_ptr[CBasicAuth] basic_auth
+
+    def __init__(self, username=None, password=None):
+        """Create a new basic auth object.
+
+        Parameters
+        ----------
+        username : string
+        password : string
+        """
+        self.basic_auth.reset(new CBasicAuth())
+        if username:
+            self.basic_auth.get().username = tobytes(username)
+        if password:
+            self.basic_auth.get().password = tobytes(password)
+
+    @property
+    def username(self):
+        """Get the username."""
+        return self.basic_auth.get().username
+
+    @property
+    def password(self):
+        """Get the password."""
+        return self.basic_auth.get().password
+
+    @staticmethod
 
 Review comment:
   Maybe for consistency with the equivalent FlightInfo, etc. methods we can call these `serialize` and `deserialize`?
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

+    def __init__(self, username=None, password=None):

wesm commented on issue #4998: ARROW-5876: [C++][Python] add basic auth flight proto message to C++ and Python 
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4998#issuecomment-517757714
 
 
   Do you have the right versions of clang-tidy/clang-format? The targets are only generated if the right versions are found
   
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/CMakeLists.txt#L186
   
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/cmake_modules/FindClangTools.cmake
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

wesm commented on issue #4998: ARROW-5876: [C++][Python] add basic auth flight proto message to C++ and Python 
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4998#issuecomment-517757714
 
 
   Do you have the right version (LLVM 7) of clang-tidy/clang-format? The targets are only generated if the right versions are found
   
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/CMakeLists.txt#L186
   
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/cmake_modules/FindClangTools.cmake

rymurr commented on issue #4998: ARROW-5876: [C++][Python] add basic auth flight proto message to C++ and Python 
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4998#issuecomment-517758097
 
 
   i figured it out. I was using clang from conda and clang-tidy etc aren't in conda-forge (at least for clang-7). Forcing cmake to use my OS clang-7 worked. Was able to run `make format` now

lihalite commented on issue #4998: ARROW-5876: [C++][Python] add basic auth flight proto message to C++ and Python 
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4998#issuecomment-518639982
 
 
   I think calling it "HTTP basic auth" is misleading, it's really just implementing Flight/Java's "basic" authentication scheme across all languages. (Right now you wouldn't be able to implement HTTP basic auth anyways, as we don't use the Authorization: header)

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: We should implement a set of common auth methods in Flight itself to have standardized ways to do things like basic auth.
fields.summary: [FlightRPC] Implement basic auth across all languages
